name: A Weird, Medieval Coma
description:
You just woke up in a medieval world, inside your coma. You gotta fight the knight to escape this coma. Seize this opportunity and fight! Explore the mini-world around you and make sure to listen carefully to your conscience!

"A Weird, Medieval Coma" is a mini-game made in 7 days for the Epic Megajam 2020. Unfortunately, I couldn't upload it in time for submission. 

This game can be played with mouse & keyboard as well as with a gamepad.
